name: Sanjay Dey
tagline: Freelance Web Designer , WordPress Developer & SEO
description:
I am Freelance Web Designer with 16 yrs of experience in, Web Design & Web Development. Affordable Web Design & Custom WordPress Development services from experience Freelance Web Designer. I built modern clean &  easy to use responsive websites with User Experience & SEO in mind.  
I have started a career as a Web designer in 2000 and till now I have worked more than 250+ websites all over the worlds like USA, UK. Australia, Canada etc.
